IntergallacticÂ¶

Upon instantiation of Intergallactic, it will returns an object

Returns:

Object: list of modules:

  • Intergallactic.account: Account related module. see account for more.
  • Intergallactic.gltc: Gallactic blockhain related module. see gallactic for more.
  • Intergallactic.Txn: Transaction related module. see transaction for more.
  • Intergallactic.Contract: Contract related module. see contract for more.
  • Intergallactic.utils: Utilities related module. see utilities for more.

Example:

// in node.js
const Intergallactic = require('intergallactic');
const intergallactic = new Intergallactic({ url: 'http://localhost:1337', protocol: 'jsonrpc' });

// intergallactic consists of main modules to interact with Gallactic
// e.g: intergallactic.account, intergallactic.gltc, intergallactic.Txn
